name: VilCity Arabic
description:
WELCOME TO VILCITY ARABIC GAME

  • There are 2 Main Topics 
    -   القرية
    -   المدينة
  • Avoid red-eye enemies 
  • Get 3 Camels to go to Next Scene
  • Get more than 10 diamonds for Arabic Dictionary
  • Get ready and Answer quizzes by dragging and dropping the answer in the Box provided
  • Watch out the Timer in each quizzes
  • Complete all levels and Get your Score!

Have A Fun Arabic Language Game <3
